data.name: Please, Come Back Before Winter
data.detailed_description:
Please, come back before winter an exploration Rogue Lite!


Play Naëlle the brave little mouse and challenge the arrival of the cold.


Yesterday, we buried mom. My brothers and sisters left, each on their side. Our house that once sparkled with life and love seems now empty and cold. Though, winter is not there yet. Winter… Pull yourself together Naëlle!

In order to brave the cold season, I have to go to the nearest mine to get supplies in food and charcoal. Hopefully - and helped by the fabulous powers of the ancestral penguins - I will reunite my family and give back our house its glow of yesterday.

The journey promises to be exciting. Mother Nature is so beautiful in this season. But don't get lost on the way, Naëlle! You know it, the first frosts come faster than it appears and you will have to hurry to get back to The Burrow. Don't forget to mark your path, you shouldn't get lost on the way back ...

data.short_description: Please, come back before winter is a poetic adventure game. Play as Naëlle the brave little mouse and find your lost siblings, grieving after the passing of your adoptive mother. Mark your way as you explore an inconstant world to get home as fast as possible before winter arrives!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 SP1
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10-compatible graphics card with at least 1GB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
